title: Analyze Stuck Pipe Incident
description: While drilling, the drill string becomes stuck. A remote operations engineer must analyze real-time data to determine the cause and recommend a course of action.

tasks.description: Retrieve the last hour of real-time drilling data, including weight on bit, torque, and mud properties.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete dataset leading up to the incident is retrieved.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to diagnose the likely sticking mechanism (e.g., differential sticking, wellbore collapse).
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer correctly identifies 'differential sticking' as the probable cause.

tasks.description: Recommend immediate actions to the rig crew, such as spotting a freeing agent and working the pipe.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clear, actionable recommendations are sent to the rig to resolve the issue.
